item.description:
Join us to practice your skills and meet new salseros! It's the perfect way to spend a Sunday afternoon!

Dancers of all levels attend our meet-up to socialize, practice, learn from and teach each other. There is no organized instruction, but instructors are available to answer questions, give tips and dance with you! Everyone is friendly and welcoming, so please come ready to ask people to dance.

And for those of you who DO want instruction, we now offer classes before the meet-up, so if you come early, we'll give you something new to try!

Salsa Sunday Schedule:

Classes: $15 each or $25 for 2 (contact Anara for discount packages!)

3:30-4:30 Partnering on1 (For Beginner & Advanced Beginner Dancers)
3:00-4:00 Spinning & Styling on2 (For Intermediate-Advanced Dancers)
4:00-5:00 Partnering on2 (For Intermediate-Advanced Dancers)

Meet-up & Practice: $5

4:30-6:00 Open Practice and Social Dancing
6:00 Practice Ends...but you can join us at Ryles anytime from 7-midnight (with a meet-up discount!)

To get more more information about these (or any) of our classes, training programs or performance team, please feel free to contact me or visit www.metamovements.com

group.name: The Boston & Cambridge Salsa Meetup Group

item.name: The Boston/Cambridge Salsa Meeting
